data.comment: Today's referee, Christopher Penso, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Christopher Penso, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Free kick Philadelphia.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
In Los Angeles Los Angeles's Diego Rossi is caught offside.
The match at Banc of California Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Raymon Gaddis, who is down injured.
[47] gets his shot on target but fails to score for [48].
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Raymon Gaddis is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Los Angeles's Diego Rossi is on target but unsuccessful.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Christopher Penso.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Philadelphia's half?
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles's [49] breaks free at [24]. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Christopher Penso awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Andre Blake is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Andre Blake returns to the field for Philadelphia after picking up a slight injury.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Christopher Penso awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Philadelphia's Sergio Santos has run offside.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Christopher Penso signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Los Angeles pushes forward through Tristan Blackmon, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Christopher Penso signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Philadelphia.
Christopher Penso waits before resuming play because Jose Martinez for Philadelphia is still down.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Jose Martinez for Philadelphia is back on the field again.
Sergio Santos puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Jamiro Monteiro.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
Los Angeles needs to be cautious. Philadelphia have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Raymon Gaddis is booked for the away team.
Carlos Vela of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Christopher Penso signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Philadelphia's area.
Free kick in a good position for Los Angeles!
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Carlos Vela.
Christopher Penso awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
Philadelphia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Philadelphia drives forward and Kacper Przybylko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Christopher Penso signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Christopher Penso.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Martinez (Philadelphia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Philadelphia.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
Christopher Penso awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Philadelphia push upfield but Christopher Penso quickly pulls them for offside.
The 1st half is prolonged by 8 minutes of added time.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Christopher Penso.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Los Angeles.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia are caught offside.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Christopher Penso signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Christopher Penso signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Diego Palacios for Los Angeles has been booked by Christopher Penso and receives a first yellow card.
Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) has received a yellow card from Christopher Penso.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Banc of California Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Los Angeles.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Philadelphia take a 1-2 lead thanks to Jakob Glesnes.
Diego Rossi levels the score at 2-2.
Great play from Mark Anthony Kaye to set up the goal.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Rossi for Los Angeles is whistled offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Philadelphia have a dangerous throw-in.
Diego Rossi of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Christopher Penso.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Banc of California Stadium.
Kacper Przybylko (Philadelphia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Los Angeles pushes forward through Carlos Vela, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Los Angeles Los Angeles drive forward through Latif Blessing. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Andre Blake is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Philadelphia's Andre Blake is back in action after a slight knock.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Christopher Penso.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Banc of California Stadium.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Christopher Penso signals a free kick to Los Angeles just outside Philadelphia's area.
Los Angeles's [49] gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Los Angeles are coming forward and Carlos Vela gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
[47] ([48]) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Christopher Penso awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Christopher Penso awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Sergio Santos (Philadelphia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bryce Duke is replacing Mark Anthony Kaye for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Goal! The away team take a 2-3 lead through Brendan Aaronson.
Sergio Santos with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
